title: Best of the Program | Guests: Cassy Garcia & Stewart Whitson | 11/3/22
description:
President Biden held a last-second Hail Mary speech regarding the midterms and democracy. Glenn and Stu review the desperate speech as Glenn points out where the actual threat to democracy lies. U.S. House candidate Cassy Garcia joins to make her case for why she should take the seat of a long-serving Democrat. Stewart Whitson, legal director for the Foundation for Government Accountability, points out how the DOJ’s plan to “protect” voters could lead to disastrous results.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
